direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods modify the internal state of the Parser object by updating a key component (TreeBuilder in setTreeBuilder, ParseSettings in settings).
Both methods enable or disable tracking of specific aspects (errors in setTrackErrors, settings in settings).
Both methods modify the tracking behavior of the Parser object (position tracking in setTrackPosition, settings tracking in settings).

enhanced_by.reason: Both methods require URL parser initialization.
Environment setup is required before validating URLs.
Both methods verify URL formats and handle similar exceptions.
